newsitem.title: USA: Chart House CEO Roberts resigns.
newsitem.headline: Chart House CEO Roberts resigns.

text.p: Chart House Enterprises Inc Friday said Harry Roberts has resigned as president and chief executive officer and as a director of the company to pursue personal interests.
Steven McGillin, currently senior vice president of operations, has been promoted to executive vice president of operations.

William Kuntz , executive vice president, chief financial officer and general counsel, and McGillin will assume Roberts' duties and responsibilities for an interim period. McGillin will supervise operations and concept development, and Kuntz will be responsible for finance, legal and administration.

The company also said Alex. Brown & Sons Inc. has been engaged to assist the board of directors in evaluating financing proposals and other strategic alternatives for the company. Chart House Enterprises operates 64 restaurants in the United States, the U.S. Virgin Islands and Puerto Rico.
